channel.title: Why?
channel.description: Every one has a different experience with rsc which is why this topic is being made. I am studying what players find in a game to be interesting and fun (this goes for multiple games) but since this is a rsc section lets keep it about rsc. Id like to know how you were introduced to rsc and what caught your attention. Then if you can, elaborate on the different features/aspects of the game.

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

iMubbY App:

Loool I know this is off topic but since everyone is talking about their RSC history, I didn’t even know what the wilderness was I was like 10/11 and I hacked a lot of accounts with free membership scams and their recovery questions being their name for example name1 name2 name3 etc. Them days were funny and thinking back now why didn’t I PK

So that means Mr.Pile of shit found out about wilderness 2 years ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @Tim_Dog Tim Dog
item.description:
@Tim_Dog wrote:

[quote=“AlCoHoLiC, post:47, topic:432844”][quote author=elyad link=topic=535552.msg3920909#msg3920909 date=1329689699]
Me, Arch Silver & Low Fighter use to run the castle, Miss guise like Xxkillersxx, 311 Deaths, The Jackyl, Yogiispure, Mystic004, Maddeath, Atlantian, Poets Rule, Official (Plate Pure), War Elixir (Plate Pure), Out 4 Fun, Then you had Blick, D A V I etc, Then there was PBS like Dark–Ness, D E S I R E… A S H L E Y (Think she had a 30 DEF, a High 90+ Def and a PB) Maybe mistaken about her PB. Could carry the list on forever! Good old Days!

Bring back the days of Slow Rates, Slow economy & the enjoyment of playing RSC without easy gains and the hard work you have to put in.
[/quote]

low fighter/low archer checking in, do you remember 89blind89? he was level 99 from like 2002 till he quit lol

I remember Blick saying that she died twice in a year at some point.
Probably true. It was impossible to kill her solo because of those horny kids.

in around 2004 she had over 300 sets of rune honestly it was crazy that was alottt back then[/quote]

Hey bowey my english friend

89blind89 was a friend of mine. he was rather a trainer than a pker.

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:57, topic:432844”][quote author=da real hype link=topic=535552.msg3915472#msg3915472 date=1329135826]
i started because i got a new computer and wanted to play a game other than turn based games what i used to play when i went to library. . back then it was pk everywhere and u could only switch 3 times so that ran out for me in a day so pking wasnt big for me but when wild came out i was hooked. and played constantly. also when they had the highscores list for whos the best currently playing as of right now was always a challenge for me to be on that list which i was for like an hr lol
[/quote]To be honest that’s one of the shittiest reasons I’ve heard. You must be retarded I take it?[/quote]

whats bad about me wanting to play a game other than turn based?

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @fran_ta_the_brah fran ta the brah
item.description:
@fran_ta_the_brah wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:55, topic:432844”][quote author=KO9 link=topic=535552.msg3926582#msg3926582 date=1330287561]Slow experience is unlikely to work in an environment where players have the choice of playing a server with a faster experience rate. Problem is though the game doesn’t really work with a higher experience rate. The value of items depreciates because they are easier to refine and obtain, far less time is spent leveling characters and thus players are less invested in the game.

There’s a reason most mmorpgs have slow experience rates and that’s to essentially force you to repeat the same content, thereby keeping you playing longer but also investing your time in the character, creating an emotional attachment. Once you complete the leveling content in RSC what really is there to do other than stake or PK and the amount of fun and replayability you can get out of that when the rewards are essentially worthless (due to skewed economy) is limited at best.
[/quote]
Absolutely bang on. To elaborate on this, it’s also why there’s so many trolls and rule breakers in the community: they simply have nothing to lose, if they’re banned they can make the same character in a few days/weeks or just obtain one from a friend. With a really slow XP rate and limited access to the game players will respect it more. I’m sure there will be less online to start with but hopefully a tight-knit community that isn’t overrun with trolls will turn into a much nicer community like it was back on RSC. I know a lot of people dislike RSC private servers due to the constant ‘umad faggot?’ type of abuse they receive regardless of what they’re doing in-game. People were petrified about getting banned or muted which is why we’ve implemented a black mark and appeal section along with the in-game report abuse functionality. Hopefully a much more strict and consistent punishment system will help but like you said players have a choice, on RSC there was only one option so they either behaved or they couldn’t play the game they loved. The only way to replicate this is create a server that is clearly miles better than anything else and before now that’s only been achievable with content as everyone used the same base.

she was called michelle wasnt she if i remember? long time ago now like… luke do u remember that phaggot called “xdealer”

Yeah Michelle. I remember the name Xdealer but that’s about it, I think I used to fight him as a level 80 in Edgeville dungeon. He gained levels really fast and overtook me though.

I’ve recently seen a ‘‘Blick’’ at RSC castle, Doubt its Michelle, Why dont you find out for us Luke

I would but I’d look a bit weird asking her about RSC nearly 8 years later… It’s kind of forbidden to talk about! I haven’t got it in me to even tell her about RSCEmulation.

I also remember when I Wicked I, Made ‘‘Wicked Matt’’ and started castle pking on there 65-70’s with Adx & Sue Me’s they wernt as good down at castle as they were high leveling.

Yeah, we used to be friends whilst I was levelling up but he was in a mood one day and decided to attack me. Luckily Adx1/Sue Me was close by and they kept him away whilst I trained. :D[/quote]
im with u on this

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @Kryptix Kryptix
item.description:
@Kryptix wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:52, topic:432844”]Slow experience is unlikely to work in an environment where players have the choice of playing a server with a faster experience rate. Problem is though the game doesn’t really work with a higher experience rate. The value of items depreciates because they are easier to refine and obtain, far less time is spent leveling characters and thus players are less invested in the game.

There’s a reason most mmorpgs have slow experience rates and that’s to essentially force you to repeat the same content, thereby keeping you playing longer but also investing your time in the character, creating an emotional attachment. Once you complete the leveling content in RSC what really is there to do other than stake or PK and the amount of fun and replayability you can get out of that when the rewards are essentially worthless (due to skewed economy) is limited at best.[/quote]
Absolutely bang on. To elaborate on this, it’s also why there’s so many trolls and rule breakers in the community: they simply have nothing to lose, if they’re banned they can make the same character in a few days/weeks or just obtain one from a friend. With a really slow XP rate and limited access to the game players will respect it more. I’m sure there will be less online to start with but hopefully a tight-knit community that isn’t overrun with trolls will turn into a much nicer community like it was back on RSC. I know a lot of people dislike RSC private servers due to the constant ‘umad faggot?’ type of abuse they receive regardless of what they’re doing in-game. People were petrified about getting banned or muted which is why we’ve implemented a black mark and appeal section along with the in-game report abuse functionality. Hopefully a much more strict and consistent punishment system will help but like you said players have a choice, on RSC there was only one option so they either behaved or they couldn’t play the game they loved. The only way to replicate this is create a server that is clearly miles better than anything else and before now that’s only been achievable with content as everyone used the same base.

AlCoHoLiC:

she was called michelle wasnt she if i remember? long time ago now like… luke do u remember that phaggot called “xdealer”

Yeah Michelle. I remember the name Xdealer but that’s about it, I think I used to fight him as a level 80 in Edgeville dungeon. He gained levels really fast and overtook me though.

elyad:

I’ve recently seen a ‘‘Blick’’ at RSC castle, Doubt its Michelle, Why dont you find out for us Luke

I would but I’d look a bit weird asking her about RSC nearly 8 years later… It’s kind of forbidden to talk about! I haven’t got it in me to even tell her about RSCEmulation.

elyad:

I also remember when I Wicked I, Made ‘‘Wicked Matt’’ and started castle pking on there 65-70’s with Adx & Sue Me’s they wernt as good down at castle as they were high leveling.

Yeah, we used to be friends whilst I was levelling up but he was in a mood one day and decided to attack me. Luckily Adx1/Sue Me was close by and they kept him away whilst I trained.

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:48, topic:432844”]I know Blick IRL although I haven’t seen her for like 2 years now… It’s true though, she never died and got protected by so many people (including me for a while), I caught her dead twice though, I think I have a screenshot saved on my old PC actually…

Her brother James used the account too though so you never really knew who it was without directly asking, it used to be a helmet flash for her and legs for her brother. They had to be well careful because Jagex were suspicious anyway.[/quote]

I’ve recently seen a ‘‘Blick’’ at RSC castle, Doubt its Michelle, Why dont you find out for us Luke

I also remember when I Wicked I, Made ‘‘Wicked Matt’’ and started castle pking on there 65-70’s with Adx & Sue Me’s they wernt as good down at castle as they were high leveling.

Read full topic

item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“Mi4, post:41, topic:432844”][quote author=elyad link=topic=535552.msg3920909#msg3920909 date=1329689699]
Me, Arch Silver & Low Fighter use to run the castle, Miss guise like Xxkillersxx, 311 Deaths, The Jackyl, Yogiispure, Mystic004, Maddeath, Atlantian, Poets Rule, Official (Plate Pure), War Elixir (Plate Pure), Out 4 Fun, Then you had Blick, D A V I etc, Then there was PBS like Dark–Ness, D E S I R E… A S H L E Y (Think she had a 30 DEF, a High 90+ Def and a PB) Maybe mistaken about her PB. Could carry the list on forever! Good old Days!

Bring back the days of Slow Rates, Slow economy & the enjoyment of playing RSC without easy gains and the hard work you have to put in.
[/quote]

Great post <3

And agreed about the slow economy![/quote]

Slow experience is unlikely to work in an environment where players have the choice of playing a server with a faster experience rate. Problem is though the game doesn’t really work with a higher experience rate. The value of items depreciates because they are easier to refine and obtain, far less time is spent leveling characters and thus players are less invested in the game.

There’s a reason most mmorpgs have slow experience rates and that’s to essentially force you to repeat the same content, thereby keeping you playing longer but also investing your time in the character, creating an emotional attachment. Once you complete the leveling content in RSC what really is there to do other than stake or PK and the amount of fun and replayability you can get out of that when the rewards are essentially worthless (due to skewed economy) is limited at best.

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @sw0o0sh sw0o0sh
item.description:
@sw0o0sh wrote:

When I was a young chap I was fascinated by the medieval concept. Nowadays it’s a rather drab game. Now that I am no longer a young chap and my thumbs out of my ass, I am more interested in the development aspect, if someones going to pay up.

Read full topic

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @Fear_Nuture Fear Nuture
item.description:
@Fear_Nuture wrote:

Pking was cool, i remember when i lost mine and my brothers first r2h. lol he was so mad that we had to go back to rune long haha. i used to get the tremors when i pked. I was literally shaking when i pked hah. I think it should be normal rsc(rates and all) and just make it start over from the beginning. all skills, items, everything be like brand new old rsc

item.title: Why?
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

i remember when i was training range xpkxpkx would always come and try to steal my spot but i never switched for anyone so he always did. when he was lvl 41 he would pk at castle and would try to range me but his 10hp i would 1 hit him with range lol. i was team with low archer but low fighter would always wanna kill me since i was a 51 pure ranger. what i loved bout rsc is i was low hp and yet i could survive it wasnt a guaranteed 3 hit even though i could get 1 hit (with help of a ranger). mini snipe was higher range then me so always tried to kill me but he stopped training and i passed him in range but not lvl’s so i was always killin him. if u were a pb u almost always needed a ranger to try to take on a rune pure and rune pures were SO afraid of mages. makes me want to make a perfect cb formula like rsc was

lol anyone remember when u would get like a 90+ stat and your friends wanted u to kill them for the lvl. was fun. got my first phat from a friend that way

Read full topic
